<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_devtools_transporter_package</collection><condition/><description>Stores the scope of the current record when it is deleted in the transaction cache.</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>x_snc_devtools_t*_p* - Remember scope</name><order>100</order><priority>42800</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var transactionCache = new TransactionCacheAPI('DEVTOOLS');
	transactionCache.SetItem('TransporterPackage_Scope',GetStringValue(current.sys_scope));

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-10 13:06:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>72b65ffc3b607a5062bf612c95e45ab5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_snc_devtools_t*_p* - Remember scope</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="DevTools WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_devtools">d689f6901bd38450a89720a8ec4bcbfd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DevTools WORK IN PROGRESS">d689f6901bd38450a89720a8ec4bcbfd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_72b65ffc3b607a5062bf612c95e45ab5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-10 13:43:36</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when><x_snc_datasilos_created>false</x_snc_datasilos_created></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=72b65ffc3b607a5062bf612c95e45ab5"/></record_update>
